website_summaries.verdict: Its trio of cameras, speedy processor, and gorgeous display make Samsung’s flagship phone a tempting option.
cons: This is a fairly pricy model

website_summaries.verdict: It's pricey, but this Samsung phone has a ton of great features and a high performance level.
pros: Includes latest smartphone camera technologies, including a triple-lens rear camera
Offers a fast wireless charging option
Includes 128GB of internal memory, and you can add storage with a microSD card
Includes face recognition and an in-display fingerprint detector for added security
cons: Some customers bothered by the location of the in-screen camera
Touchscreen is not the most responsive

website_summaries.verdict: This top-of-the-range model comes from one of the leading makers of Android phones.
pros: Stunning infinity display with vivid colors
Excellent pro-quality triple rear camera with ultra-wide option and a high-end 10 MP front selfie camera
Ultrasonic fingerprint detector integrated into the screen

customer_reviews.title: Texts, Calls, Data DO NOT WORK!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone has Exynos NOT snapdragon. It is an international version and does not work with my straighttalk SIM card. First, it doesn't connect to my mobile data, I had to add an Access Point Name so that the data would work. Second, the calls will not work unless the "wifi calling" is on. Plus, even when turned on, the calls hang up randomly, sometimes wont even ring, and 70% of the time I try to call someone, a box shows up that says "Not registered on network". I also can't send pictures AT ALL, and my texts randomly won't send.
customer_reviews.author: Bandido69

customer_reviews.title: Product received was not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Device is not a factory unlocked device as mentioned in the seller description, and contained a T-Mobile documentation/boot screen. Upon booting, I was notified that the device had been reset (it was listed as new and unactivated), and I would need to log in under the account previously used for the device. Customer service did respond within minutes to my email explaining the situation, which is a good sign, but now I have to call during my work hours to get everything straightened out. They recommended a hard reset and sent a video explaining how to do so, but nothing has worked so far. Many recent comments appear to have similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile screen
customer_reviews.text: This is the second review I've made. Along with receiving my phone a week after it was expected, it came straight from the box with chinks in the screen and the screen is so fragile that almost every day a new dent shows up in the screen from just sitting in my pocket (with a case) I don't move around too much. I have an office job so there's no reason for the screen to dent so much
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Una'Dia

customer_reviews.title: NOT FACTORY SEALED OR UNLOCKED BY SAMSUNG
customer_reviews.text: This was not factory sealed and was not unlocked by Samsung. There was a piece of shipping tape used to keep the box together.
customer_reviews.author: MATEO THE YETTI

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEW
customer_reviews.text: Received open box. The phone was not sealed and the items were scattered around the box. Screen was in spanish when turned on. Do not think it is the US Version.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Niño

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not "Like New"
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Took the phone to my cell provider. It won't take a SIM card. Switched back to my old phone and it worked just fine. So not only is the phone not "Like New", it's literally broken. So now I have no choice but to return it. Orginal review: I bought it used and it was supposed to be like new. There are micro scratches all over the screen and there's also knicks and dents along the sides and on 2 of the corners. Good condition, yes. But certainly not "Like New" by any means. It's a hassle to return things during the pandemic so I'm just gonna keep it. Not satisfied for what I paid for it though.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: WARRANTY IS A SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Hello, My phone stopped working in a few months (which is understandable, manufacturing issues happen and thats what warranty is for). However, Samsung Technical Support said it does not (and never has) accepted warranties of devices bought from amazon since the bill of sale does not contain the IMEI number. I am having my device shipped back unrepaired after wasting nearly 2 hours between Samsung and amazon representatives. I would blame amazon for this issue of false advertisement. Update: I was finally able to get it fixed from UbreakIfix
customer_reviews.author: Hassan Naveed

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Samsung!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the worst phone I've ever bought, Samsung refused to hold up their warranty so Amazon did. I either received a faulty refurbished phone or another defective Samsung Galaxy S10 because this one is worse. Now I have to request a replacement for this one. To me Samsung is a terrible company. I do appreciate Amazons help with this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 9 months.
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone at the end of December 2019, and it's been working perfectly all this time and I was very happy with it. The battery lasts a LONG time and everything works exactly as it should. About a week or two ago, however, the battery started draining really fast no matter how I optimize the settings. And just a few days ago (September 2020), it started randomly turning off. Now it won't stay on very long before it shuts off, and is totally unusable like this. I've restarted, updated, done a complete factory reset, and nothing has fixed this issue. So the phone works beautifully, until it doesn't. It only lasted me just under 9 months.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL picture quality!!
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL! So counter-intuitive! No physical "Home" button; the "virtual" home button does not even appear most of the time when you need it. Voice-to-text accuracy is even WORSE than on the S6 I traded in, none of the Apps or settings transferred properly.... it just goes on and on with BAD FUNCTIONALITY all the way around! No spell-check, STUPID swipe-to-answer setup (Why not just TAP THE BUTTON??) On and on with the worst, backward functionality :( and... the picture quality SUCKS!! It is embarrassingly bad! Bad focus, bad brightness, overall sh*tty quality that should never passed the evaluators! WTH with this: SO blatantly bad!! :( The S10 is a bad joke played on consumers including me! :(
customer_reviews.author: F. Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Missing option.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have dual sim support like my previous s9. Don't know what I'm going to do now.
customer_reviews.author: ibrahim gharbawi

customer_reviews.title: How to claim your buds!
customer_reviews.text: Download the Shop Samsung App and head over to "My Inbox". It should be the first thing to show up! I do not know how long you have to claim it but there you go!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Escoto

customer_reviews.title: Poor components
customer_reviews.text: For the 3rd time I've had to send the phone back to Samsung due to "moisture detected in the charging port". I believe they used cheap components and the sensor is buggy. I live in a high humid area, but the phone should still charge as all my other electronic devices do just fine. Given that this phone needs a repair every 3 months I'd recommend other options. Samsung does not have many "stores" to fix and has poor customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has NEVER worked right
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use my cell phone for texting. I still keep my land line. This phone WILL NOT give you an audio notification that you have a text!! I thought I just wasnt used to it. That it was in the settings. But I took it to my service provider and they could NOT help! Then I spent HOURS on the phone with Samsung. The tech finally told me it was some app called "Emoji Phone" that was preventing my audio notifications from coming thru. But it will NOT allow you to uninstall it. Thought I was getting a GOOD DEAL from Amazon. Turns out I just bought someone else's problems.. NO MORE LIGHTENING DEALS FOR ME!!!
customer_reviews.author: tallullu&sierra

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I've had my old phone for over 3 years and never had issues with the screen getting scratched up from regular use. The screen on this phone is so sensitive, that it will be completely covered in small scratches to where you can't watch videos without seeing them. Buy this phone if you want a scratched up screen within 2 months of owning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: freeze
customer_reviews.text: make sure to get the warranty from Samsung when you buy this product. I bought this Samsung galaxy s10 on prime day. It was good for couple of months even though occasionally while I am watching youtube or watching some facebook video, this black screen would come in as a screen shot, and goes away while pausing all videos. I thought it would go away with reboot or after 1 software update, but it didn't go away. it got worse. as of today I get that screen pause/ screen shots on my screen few times on my phone. if it something that cannot be fixed over software update, it needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: SanalBathery

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product.
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed product. Camera works great and all software very responsive. Samsung Pay with MST is another great feature. Allows using phone pay with traditional credit card readers without NFC by simulating a magnetic card swipe. Does not work with recessed card readers like the ones at the gas stations though. Battery life is not great but adequate. Will last through the day with normal use of GPS, browser and talk. Only slight issue is the fingerprint reader is not as sensitive as a dedicated fingerprint reader and requires a harder press on the screen. Bought a second unit for myself after buying the first one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone!
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone on My List for quite awhile, so one day when the price dropped...I ordered it. I use tracfone and this was really easy to get it set up. Tracfone sent me a sim card and I had no trouble putting it in and got it all set up. Samsung has Samsung Switch so you can set this phone beside your old Samsung and get most everything from your old phone onto the new one....The only thing I don't like is Bixby and I have shut that off so I don't mess with that.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Problems Problems...
customer_reviews.text: After a system update, I lost data connection completely. I thought it was the phone, so I ordered a replacement from Amazon. It has the same problem. Turn out it's the software update that's causing the problem. There is also no way to reverse the update. This is my first Samsung phone, I'm extremely disappointed. I will try my best to avoid any Samsung cell phone in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, though pricey
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful product continuing the Samsung Galaxy S# lineup in its natural progression. It still has the quirks of Samsung fiddling with the phone OS to make it their own, but it is a solid top-of-the-line model phone that has a long lasting battery relative to the performance it provides and if you can find it at price that you find reasonable is a smart purchase. I'm certainly biased towards pure-Android phones, and this iteration isn't that bad of a compromise in terms of how much Samsung has plastered on to it, considering how easy it is to disable the bloatware and install a different home manager.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks brand new
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit worried at first. With the help of my Grandson and the guide of the phone, we found it quiet easy to switch sims card and all the information of my LG phone over to the new phone. All cords, adapters and cables are included. Phone looks like it was never even handled. Looks factory fresh and comes with a screen protector. I would highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Great phone - but it doesn't come with expected bonus, advertised items.
customer_reviews.text: Samsung stated that if the phone was purchased by a certain date, the phone came with a set of wireless earbuds. While I like the phone, I am upset that the advertised "free" item was ignored. The moral of the story - Amazon may not fulfill what was advertized; or, if you pay for something with points, they take their time and accept the order until later. Had I known this, I would not have rushed to buy it. Had I not have had this problem, I would have given it another star. By the way, it does not come with an S stylus like previous phones and tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!  Way better than my S7
customer_reviews.text: AT&T wanted $899 for this phone, With the $200 off sale price plus Amazon Prime day special I got it for $599 Nothing negative towards seller at all. I love this phone, but I won't marry it. O_o AT&T on the other lets you BYOD. But nowhere in their policy does it say that your unlocked phone wont have all the features of the AT&T branded S10. I lost Video calling (never used it) Wifi Calling, (Also never used it) and Call protection which I did use. After 4 unsuccessful results wit my calls to ATT Customer service, I visited an ATT Store, where a rep there told me the above information. Why didn't their Customer service know this?
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lapso`

customer_reviews.title: should have bought s10e
customer_reviews.text: Its ok but I hate the curved edges of the screen. Because the edge is curved like a convex mirror it reflects light in your eyes nomatter the angle your looking at it. To make it worse most of the protective cases don't cover that area, on purpose for edge functionaliy, so its vulnerable to falling and hitting something on the front edge even with a cover on it. The edge functionality is just a couple of shortcut panels that pull out from the side of the screen, they were irritating so I turned them off anyway. I wish I would have gotten the s10e it has a flat screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accidental Touches
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic device with a stellar display and incredible build quality, though I do have a couple of personal nitpicks. One of the issues I have is accidental touches dues to the size of the phone and the curved display, however I am getting used to it so it's not as bad. Although the hole punch camera isn't as bad in person and doesn't take long to get used to it can still be a bit distracting at times. Other than that this is a very solid phone and I would recommend it to anyone wanting a good Android flagship with a headphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: You took alll the fun out of getting a new phone
customer_reviews.text: There was no SIM card in the phone.... After much angst I had to go to Sprint to be able to use phone. Without a SIM card, the phone is useless. In addition, there was no discount off retail for a S10. First time in years....very disappointing....would never have bought this phone from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MicaelaAndWade

customer_reviews.title: Great except for Bixby
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice except for Bixby. Bixby is very very annoying. I don not care for Bixby. So I fixed Bixby. I used an exacto knife to cut the Bixby button pusher out of my cell phone case. Have not heard a word from Bixby since!
customer_reviews.author: Windtwirler

customer_reviews.title: Saved about $400 buying during Prime Day
customer_reviews.text: I had just purchased this phone through a Samsung Trade-in program when I saw an article about "Great Prime Day Deals" I saw my S10 was in the Prime Deals and I returned the one I had purchased through Samsung and bought the phone through Prime Deals and was very happy with the phone. The fingerprint reader is very fast and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Tweedy

customer_reviews.title: Ok phone, nothing special about it.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about getting this new phone. It came super fast. Set up would have been easy except for the fact that I needed a new SIM CARD. I didn't know that so I had to run out, spend an extra $25 for a new sim card. Got that issue settled then for whatever reason I WAS NOT ABLE to send any text msg or e-mail messages with pictures. That took another 2 hours to figure out(, had to update the system to get it to work). Fingerprint sensor is trash, it works with any finger. For the money this phone costs there shouldn't be any issues at all. Will come back in a few mths to update.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S10, Display
customer_reviews.text: I got S10 with some small scratches on its screen and its back. I asked for a replacement, the second one also has scratches! The issue is when I look at their display, at the same time, with same settings, one is pinkish (in white page) and the other one is yellowish!!! The color difference can be seen in selfies as well. There is alittle difference in the resolution when I read a pdf file. Speakers are not exactly the same! Moreover, the earbuds are not working similarly, one is stronger than the other. (I just checked the first earbuds) The fingerprint is OK, it is not very sensitive and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works well with
customer_reviews.text: Phone batteries only last so many cycles, so I am glad I finally upgraded and don't have to be tethered all the time. The phone seems to work well. I use Sprint and could not transfer the sim from my S7 (it fits but gave an error about compatibility), so had to take it to the Sprint store and they gave me a sim at no charge and was up and running after that. You can also have sprint mail you one for a few dollars if you don't want to go into a store. The setup process copied most of my apps and data from the older S7 phone, of course lots to learn with every android rev.
customer_reviews.author: gray_mack

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sure but I am now!
customer_reviews.text: So my Samsung S7 took a dive and I needed to replace it ASAP. I bought this "refreshed" S10 hoping that it wouldn't be full of scratches that I'd need to cover and it wasn't. I know the features and am more than pleased with the upgraded device and I got it for a stellar price point. No VZW payment plans for me!
customer_reviews.author: jnsnfl

customer_reviews.title: Warning for AT+T users
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT repeat DO NOT get this phone if you are going to use it on the AT+T network AND you rely on WiFi calling. Which I do. According to AT+T it has no plans in the future to allow any unlocked phones to use WiFi calling, HD calling, VoLTE, or call protect. IT WILL NOT WORK. If you do not care about these features it is a great phone. I was forced to return it for the above reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Sim Card
customer_reviews.text: Phone was shipped to me without a sim card installed. Caused me to spend hours on the phone trying to get it activated. If it wasn't for the savings in cost, I would be totally discussed. Would recommend checking for a sim card upon receiving the phone! The phone is a good phone and seems to operated ok, haven't been able to connect to service network. Three star rating was because of no sim card.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Bodine

customer_reviews.title: It's an OK phone.
customer_reviews.text: This S10 phone is faster than the previous models. The camera is better, the battery life is better and like the fact that it comes with screen protector already installed from factory. Though, I compared the physical size of the S10 with that of the S8 and it turns out that it is identical with the only exceptions of button layout, front screen layout and rear camera layout. The proximity sensor was great in previous models, not sure why they decided to eliminate it on this S10. Overall it's a good phone, though I must say it looks like the phone manufacturers are reaching their max with what they can come up with to produce newer phones.
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: Works as exected
customer_reviews.text: Great for photos. Average battery life. I do not like the battery replacement procedure for this model. The screen size and overall size is good. Fits well in my shirt pocket with case. Sound is good. Screen sensitity is slightly lacking. I do like this phone but it is not perfect. I did buy this with a discount on Amazon. It was worth what I paid for it. Storage is good.
customer_reviews.author: P J

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This phone was an upgrade from S7 Edge from 2017 and has been an amazing upgrade. Very pleased with this S10! Price was $599 at the time of purchase and now it’s $733! Wow!
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: My dad is in love with his new phone
customer_reviews.text: My dad is very excited about his new phone. For the past few days he is updating and learning the new phone. My dad is 78 and he said it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Newton

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone
customer_reviews.text: The Qualcomm chip is the way to go.. i also have the international version S10+ with the Samsung chip and this phone blows that one out of the water! double the battery life, super fast and all the apps work as they should. the S10+ with the Samsung Chip isnt as good. wish i could have sent it back and boughten another one of this version.
customer_reviews.author: Df186

customer_reviews.title: USB c moisture detected glitch
customer_reviews.text: Had a s9+ had the moisture detected glitch after a year and decided to upgrade to s10 and after 2 or 3 months my phone wont charge through usb c port and says moisture detected and it won't go away and there was never water in there in the first place. I know it's a common problem and really needs some updates or revision to the design. I've gone through a whole checklist of fixes and still no luck. Love the phone sick of usb c issues. So frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: One downside
customer_reviews.text: Great phone overall but while they added the camera features they put the bio-metric scanner on the front of the phone. After adding a nice rubberized glass cover on the phone I can no longer use the bio-metrics. The S8 has it perfectly on the back where you can just use your middle finger to unlock. All other functions are great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, with snapdragon.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the phone. Havent done much with it yet but mainly wanted to say I did indeed get a snapdragon version. Not sure what went wrong with other peoples orders. I assume they went with a 3rd party seller. Even did mine on the prime day sale. No complaints. Saved me $400 over buying through att.
customer_reviews.author: Josh taylor

customer_reviews.title: Buying an unlocked phone was easier that I expected!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this was my first "unlocked" phone experience. It was a little scary buying a phone outside of my cell provider. But moving my SIM card from the old phone to this one was a breeze. After I logged into my provider account, I saw that that new phone model and serial # was updated. Next, purchasing the newest Galaxy was an easy choice! Been a longtime Samsung Galaxy user. I did not realize the camera upgrades were so awesome! I have been tempted to go to the iPhone due to the camera. But no need now! This phone is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Madonna M.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, but like all smart phone, too expensive. Even at the sale price I got it for, it's too expensive. On the up side, battery life is surprisingly better than my old S7.
customer_reviews.author: eh

customer_reviews.title: First was a dud, waiting on my replacement.
customer_reviews.text: The phone was supposed to be new but arrived slightly scratched/dinged up, nothing unbearable but definitely a bummer. After leaving my phone on my desk overnight the screen would display properly but the touch screen was dead. Contacted Amazon and am currently awaiting on my replacement. Other than my issue the device is probably the best phone I've ever owned. I'm really impressed by the cameras and the screen is so crisp. Will update when I can use my phone again!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Schlect

customer_reviews.title: Really very bad experience phone
customer_reviews.text: The S9 is much better than the Galaxy S10 on the design of the phone. The phone looks very similar to the S9. However, the fingerprint inside of the front display is a pain in the ass. The front camera inside the display is a problem too. Usually, the fingerprint doesn’t recognize anything. I run the setup with multiple fingers and same problem. The only improve over S9 is the battery life and some camera modes. In general, it's really a very bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo M.

customer_reviews.title: Not value for money for the feature set
customer_reviews.text: Massively overpriced for the features and the icing on the cake was it got reduced 100 dollars the day i received mine and Amazon would not adjust my price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Southern

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent phone
customer_reviews.text: It has its up and down. The major down is the fingerprint reader is horrible compared to my Iphone I use to have it does not read fingerprints very well. I do love the face reconition feature, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this from Amazon warehous and I'm quite disappointed. It came with 2 visible scartches on the screen and when using the phone you can feel them on the tips of your finger. The camera quality is ok, nowhere near iPhone levels. The battery life is so short as well and the phone screen scratches easily. Overall pretty disappointed in this phone, I was expecting so much more since this is my first "luxury" phone. Yet somehow for the higher price point I instead got a fragile low quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great phones!
customer_reviews.text: These phones are beautiful! I ordered 2 of these and both were unlocked and in perfect condition. I took them straight to Verizon and they were activated with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't a brand new. Refurbished. Don't by it here
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my wife and was unsatisfied because it looks that it wasn't the brend new one. It seemed that someone already used it, cuz we had a Turkish Google account on it. We always have issues with this phone and we couldn't returning to their manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone super camera
customer_reviews.text: Great phone I bought it unlocked I had hoped to use my same AT&T carrier it did not work with them no matter what switched and bundled to Comcast saved a car load of money excellent phone
customer_reviews.author: Paula K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was super scared after reading the review that someone was sold a block of clay instead of a phone, but the phone arrived directly from Amazon and was in perfect condition. No scratches or blemishes whatsoever and everything was included in the package; nothing was missing at all. Overall it was wonderful purchase, I am extremely happy with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Skye H.

customer_reviews.title: This isn't the dual sim version
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it's dual sim so i can get rid of two phones. It isn't, even though it says factory unlocked, which I understood to mean it supports dual sim. Do not buy this version if you need dual sim. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: r4z0r

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy s10 is amazing and at $599 on Primeday, my Wife and I lucked out. Very fast, very responsive. We are really loving these phones! This is the first time we have ever owned a smartphone of this caliber. First time Samsung owners and we are sold... My only regret is not getting the s10+
customer_reviews.author: Mark Herzberger

customer_reviews.title: Slower fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this at a decent sale price, so won't complain too much. But IMO, the fingerprint reader in my previous phone was quicker. Also they should always be in a convenient spot easily reachable with finger - usually the upper back is very convenient for index finger more than thumb reaching front. Battery is quite decent though my previous phone [Huwawei] was better. Only got rid of it because of all the criminal activity associated with Huwawei... A few other inconveniences, but I'm going to give this phone a good chance..
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Not long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone is December and the battery on it is already going out on it it litterly doesn't last an jr charged anymore. I hope warranty covers this cus the phone isn't even a year old
customer_reviews.author: Maria Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: AMZN Samsung Galaxy S10 unlocked = Best Deal
customer_reviews.text: So far, best phone ever (for me). Before this I bought a 10 plus through ATT. Att made it a nightmare and while at Att I got locked out THEN I returned it since I could not use it (pd restock,etc). Then I came here to AMZN to buy this phone. Worked beautifully, fits my hand size great. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Y Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked brand new works flawlessy with unlocked safelink dim card
customer_reviews.text: Very good brand new im using a safelink unlocked chip and had 0 problems setting everything up. My s8 broke because i didnt have a case and the screen just slowly cracked over time. Make sure you invest in a good screen protector and a good case or dont even bother spending 700 on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff ksiazka

customer_reviews.title: Its appear to be a customer returned unit
customer_reviews.text: the plastic film for screen+ charger were missing. I felt a slight roughness at the corners of the phone, when I looked under the microscope I saw a plastic film which is barely peeling of the phone corners, so I was not sure of using it while I pay $600+tax. This could be a "customer return sale". So I send the phone back without use it. Waiting for the phone cost to reduce after samsung will announce 2020 version of galaxy S series. I cant comment on phone as I did not use it. Product was received by Amazon on 1/30/2020 per UPS tracking records
customer_reviews.author: venkatesh

customer_reviews.title: Quite the upgrade from my Galaxy S7
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty amazing that this phone has more RAM than most notebook computers. 8GB! It's fast, sleek, and the three cameras are great. Built-in wide-angle camera lens is super useful, and you can toggle between normal and wide angle in real time while filming video. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Damon K.

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate Android phone
customer_reviews.text: For the first time, an Android phone is in the same ballpark as iPhone in regards to speed. It's a fast, snappy phone (w/ the right settings), very powerful, and has a premium feel to it thanks to the glass back and metallic finish. Only annoyance would be how to the edge screen can make screen protectors obnoxiously hard to put on, which you'll want to do since the default screen protector scratches very easily unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: John Ho

customer_reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s10. Not unlocked.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone thinking it was unlocked. But I'm getting a Verizon error and I can't activate it on tmoble. I waited forever to get this phone and now I have to wait 2 plus weeks to get a refund... I'm not a happy customer. Ebay is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked
customer_reviews.text: It's great phone but unfortunately I had to return it because AT&T locked it in their service and I couldn't switch to another carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these phones for much cheaper than listed at brick and mortar stores. First time I purchase cell phones on line. Transferred files myself. Pleasantly surprised with how easy I was able to set up this cell phone with my existing service.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Product description read very good condition in unopened, slightly damaged box. What I received was an clearly opened box (undamaged) which contained a heavily used phone with a cracked screen. Admittedly, this is the first time I've been burned by Amazon. Warehouse. Very disappointed. I also missed out on the Amazon Prime Day deal on this phone. Double burn by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: gamer12

customer_reviews.title: Genuine phone, registered on samsung website
customer_reviews.text: Got it for $579 and it is an original unlocked phone. Check out the snapshot after I registered this phone on Samsung website. The model number listed on Amazon seems slightly different but the phone I received is actually G973UZKAXAA, confirmed by Samsung through my IMEI number.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item Received
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong item and I was not even compensated after sending back the wrong item. Now using a family members phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the Snapdragon model
customer_reviews.text: This phone is being advertised as the SM-G973U (Snapdragon) however i received the Exynos version SM-G973F.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Data/lte problem
customer_reviews.text: My carrier is tmobile and i have perfect lte data with my galaxy s8. When i put my sim into the galaxy s10 it says i have 3 bars of lte but nothing would load. So i did a speed test and i was getting 0 mbs upload. I tried everything i could do to fix the problem, but i cant fix it. I updated software, cleared partition cache, soft rest, factory data reset nothing worked
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: This Galaxy 10 phone was blacklisted
customer_reviews.text: This phone was listed by Amazon as a new phone but was evidently purchased by someone from Sprint. Sprint has blacklisted the phone so now it can nolonger be used.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Tate

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far do good. Had it activated and my husband seems pleased with it. I was nervous purchasing it due to the mixed reviews about being used or international model, but it looked new and unopened.
customer_reviews.author: cupcake_queen

customer_reviews.title: I thought samsung changed thier game but highly disappointed ....!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on lightning deal, with earbuds(which were never delivered) , Came into original case but without seal, felt like it was opened by someone earlier. camera is average, too many camera options ruined the ease of taking photos.
customer_reviews.author: DEEPAK

customer_reviews.title: First phone returned
customer_reviews.text: First phone received would not work with my service provider, apparently because phone was built for South America. Amazon promptly replaced it with one that worked perfectly. Much improved battery from S7. Quite a few changes to learn in camera, contacts, phone. In spite of my learning problems as a 91 year old, the machine is a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: bdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Works with sprint
customer_reviews.text: Have had this phone for a few months now and I love everything about it. All the scanners work well and it works with sprint!
customer_reviews.author: steve hunt

customer_reviews.title: I HEART SAMSUNG!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is just another fantastic example of why i absolutely adore Samsung Tech! This phone is nothing short of perfection! Extremely fast performance and optimal visuals make this phone a masterpiece of its time! The design of this phone is truly revolutionary sleek yet rugged at the same time! I cannot say how much i adore this phone! Cant wait to save up all my pennies up for the Samsung S20 ultra!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I was very scared to purchase my new phone for the first time online. I was very happy that it came to my door without a single scratch. I've had this phone for almost a year now and it functions properly.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Us or international version?
customer_reviews.text: Have just gotten this phone today and my main concern was if it was us or international version. They don't specifically say, but for sure this is the snapdragon us version <3 so I'm happy with it! Amazing pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from an iPhone XS Max, I can say this phone blows the iPhone away. It is indeed factory unlocked, has an amazing screen resolution and response. It’s just all around a better phone than my last one. I’ve been an Apple fan since the start, but this phone changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: dboo

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone but International versionmdoes not work with Metro by T-Mobile in the U.S.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but this phone is the inernational model and does not work with Metro by T-Mobile
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria Melzer

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best phone!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the s7 edge and this phone is amazing. The phone is crazy fast, the screen is sharp, battery life is great, the fingerprint scanner is really good too oh and the camera is also very good. Haven't had much time to check everything this phone has to offer yet since I just got it but I don't regret the purchase nor the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: Thought the glass was stronger!
customer_reviews.text: Very Upset! I have a case on my phone since day one! Haven't had my phone 2 months yet. It fell out of my bed and the back shattered!!! My heart is broken!!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIE SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Solid Phone!
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone a lot. The battery life is great. The cameras are awesome. Best phone of the year!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah X

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an improvement over S6!
customer_reviews.text: Don't use the face recognition... The battery life is fantastic compared to our old Galaxy S6! The screen sensitivity needs work/adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Marcel Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Factory phone company
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact that you cannot make FaceTime call, the only options: download WhatsApp and Google Duo because it's not from your carrier it's from Amazon so you cannot make FaceTime call. It's a good phone text ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Tahi

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful Samsung S10
customer_reviews.text: Smashing. Easy setup (by my son). Lightweight, slim, powerful, just beautiful. Like it so much, I am sending one as a gift to my son now!
customer_reviews.author: ndlogan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful phone!
customer_reviews.text: Its been about a month since my purchase and I love the phone. I got the bundle with the new buds+. Those are awesome too. I'm coming from three years use of a $200 phone so this is a big jump. Package was Ginuwine, phone was unlocked and unused. Everything was easy to setup. Im not a super fan of the terms regarding arbitration, but they (Samsung) give you an opportunity to opt out. Im very happy with my purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: IMPECCABLE Android phone
customer_reviews.text: Even though I rather Microsoft's Windows phone( that Microsoft is not making anymore at least for now), this phone is IMPECCABLE with great features... in fact there are so many great features that I have yet to learn...
customer_reviews.author: Blondie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great price great upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Took a few days to get used to the controls but it is a very nice and 3asy to use phone. Great pictures and very versitile. Saved $500 buying it one prime days over buyi g it from either the carrier or Best Buys. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Well really the price is excellent for the quality of the phone.
customer_reviews.text: Me myself loved everything about the s10. To me the best of all. I have the s8 and it is still a great phone. Didn't think the s10 wouldn't be enough to upgrade from s8 to s10 but I was wrong. I returned it because my Dad passed on 7- 29- 19 and he was my income and I couldn't afford it. Hopefully in the near future I will be able to purchase it again. So I think the s10 is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazon's deal on the S10 was awesome. No regrets. It's a fantastic phone!
customer_reviews.text: Unlocked. As advertised. Box was dented but everything else was okay. Phone works perfectly. Arrived fast. Easy to transfer data using smart switch. Went from s6 to this s10. Deal was awesome through Amazon. 100 bucks off for the black one. It's a gorgeous phone and the display is the best. Sleek and smooth. Camera is amazing and I love it. No complaints at all. Will update if there are any changes. Minor scuff mark on the screen protector but not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Yuong Thong

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING 📱 🥰
customer_reviews.text: I love love my SG10 omg is so great im using it right now super Upgrade from a SG6 TO SG10 I freaking LOVE IT😍💗🥰❤💜 BEST PHONE.
customer_reviews.author: Sheyla

customer_reviews.title: There was no charger.... Still overall happy with Phone.
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone, I'm very happy with this purchase in regards to the phone. What I dislike is the fact that there was no charger in the package. Let's say I didn't have a charger already, what was I supposed to do with this phone. Who sends a phone with nothing to charge it up with...
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great invesment.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this phone tech now day is almost all the same so I wanted to go with a phone that would last me at least 2 yrs till the next high tech phone come out.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this phone for the last 2 weeks and I love it! The size of this phone it's very good! Easy to hold in your hands and the screen is amazing, it is true that sometimes the fingertips scanner it's a little hard to use sometimes but it still nothing terrible. I use it with cricket and it all goes perfectly and smoothly! I love it 10/10 recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Not all compatible with tmobile, I can't use video chat with it, useless phone unlocked. Better buy it from carrier directly. Waste of money. Older Samsung from carrier have more functionality.
customer_reviews.author: FADI REBEIZ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Great battery power...1full day without charging even with constant use. Fast speed, biometrics responsive quickly.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Locked cellphone
customer_reviews.text: I'm from Belarus and bought cellphone while I was in USA. When I came home from vocation I realized that this cellphone is locked and I can't use it until I get Verizon code to unlock it. But nor Samsung nor Verizon didn't provide me this code as according to cellphone IMEI number it was locked. Unfortunately celler couldn't help me and only Amazon took responsibility and provide the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Katsiaryna

customer_reviews.title: Certainly a better phone
customer_reviews.text: I had a Galaxy 9 and noticed a real improvement in software and image on this Galaxy 10. Probably the biggest jump between Galaxies. This is my 5th.
customer_reviews.author: Omar B Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, fingerprint sensor is not as fast or accurate as physical ones but okay, screen is amazing. Camera is also the best among the phones ever used
customer_reviews.author: Y.Nagato

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S10 Factory Unlocked Android Cell Phone | US Version | 128GB of Storage | Fingerprint ID and Facial Recognition | Long-Lasting Battery | U.S. Warranty | Prism Black
product_meta.description: Style:S10| Size:128GB| Color:BlackThe next generation Samsung Galaxy S10 is as powerful, intelligent and intuitive as you are, providing endless possibilities and next- level power in performance, productivity, creation and design. Known as the Da Vinci of smartphones, the Galaxy S10 features pro lenses to capture stunning photos and the S-Pen to easily create content and utilize your smartphone’s full capabilities. Get more from your S10 with all new creative features such as Single Take AI, Pro Video, and more. Advanced low light technology in the pro lenses gives you the ability to shoot with long exposure-style captures so your content features striking light trails. Capture video and multiple types of images with one tap of the shutter button and then easily and quickly share more, quicker. The Galaxy S10 features a powerful processor, intelligent power and a long-lasting battery that learns your habits and adapts to your screen usage in order to optimize power and performance. With Unlocked by Samsung, you get to choose the carrier, data plan, services, features and apps you want.
feature_bullets: Updated Camera Features: Get the more powerful S10 with a software update that gives you all new features including Single Take AI, Pro Video and more

High-quality camera lenses: With a full set of pro lenses, including ultrawide for stunning landscapes and micro-zoom for epic details, Galaxy S10 is a studio in your pocket, featuring live video bokeh, precision audio focus and super-stabilization
Photos and video with one tap: capture multiple images and video all at once, in one tap. Lenses, effects and filters capture the best of every moment, every time
Capture with pro-grade tool set made for masters: Control your camera settings with Pro-Video Mode to adjust the exposure, focus and more to bring your creative vision to life
Share more, quicker: The Galaxy S10 can now connect to and share with up to 5 other compatible devices at the same time using Bluetooth and WiFi, with no limits on content type or file size

Sleek Design: Samsung Galaxy S10 boasts a super-slim design that fits comfortably in your pocket and easily sits in the hand. A 6.1” endless quad HD+ dynamic AMOLED screen with nearly bezel-less infinity display offers a cinematic viewing experience

All-day Battery: Fast-charging, long-lasting intelligent power features super-speed processing, Wireless PowerShare, and massive storage, and tailors battery usage to how you live and work to optimize battery life to last all day

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,710 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
